pr_title: SAK-43189 Spinner generates elements with duplicated ids

timeline.message: SAK-43189 Spinner generates elements with duplicated ids
SAK-43189 Spinner generates elements with duplicated ids

timeline.bodyText: Just curious if the old ids were a reference to anything?
timeline.author: ern

replies.bodyText: Yeah, I thought something similar when I found this spinner code. I guess it's always executed on a page refresh so it should be fine. It's been like that for a while and there haven't been related issues, so I just focused on this specific bug and didn't modify anything else.
replies.author: bgarciaentornos
